input_text:
Job Title: Production Operators - 3rd Shift - Corn

Location: Carrollton, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
PRODUCTION OPERATOR - 3RD SHIFT - CORN - CARROLLTON, TX

Responsible for the effective and efficient operation of the production equipment and the production of quality products with as little waste as possible.

RESPONSIBILITIES (include But Not Limited To)

Prepare machines to start a production cycle, performing calibration, cleaning, and other activitiesMonitor and properly adjust machine settingsSupply raw materials or parts to semi-automated machinesConduct tests to check the operation of machines, on a regular basisTroubleshoot issues that might occur during the shiftVerify output to detect any machine-related mistakes or flawsCreate and manage records of approved and defective units or final productsCreate and maintain activity logsAdhere to health and safety regulations

Additional Duties

Must maintain a neat and clean work area to help prevent trips and fallsMust follow all safety rulesWilling to do additional duties as assigned

Requirements

Must be physically capable of the lifting associated with this job (50 lb limit).Must be able to obtain a forklift license and abide by the forklift rules.Applicant must possess adequate literacy skills to maintain the required records and verify material specifications.Must be a responsible, self-motivated, punctual & reliable individual, capable of operating high-speed equipment and efficiently controlling the line flow.Must work as a team member within the area as necessary to optimize the area’s overall performance.Must exhibit safe work habits and behavior so as not to jeopardize the safety of themselves, or others in the area.Must be able to achieve production standards.Abide by Teasdale Foods, Inc. standard for grooming appearance and work habits.

‎

Why Teasdale

Opportunities for pay adjustments/increases with skill or position development.Day One - Health, Dental, and Vision BenefitsDay One Accrual of Sick Time 401(k) Retirement Plan with Matching Contributions at 60 Days Career Growth Opportunities and Professional Development

Are you passionate about making a difference every single day, being a part of a growing team, and transforming your job into a career? Come join us at Teasdale Latin Foods!

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
